full_text:
DETECTIVE: The next time you went, or as you continued to go, did it escalate more?

Uh huh. I actually, I don't remember how long it took for me to start working for him regularly from the first time I went there, um. But, I started working every day. Every single day he was in the country I would be there. Um, I'm, I'm sorry, I like - can you give me a second.

DETECTIVE: Sure, absolutely.

Yeah. I started working there every single day, and um, I told him that I wouldn't let him put anything inside of me, that was my rule. Nothing inside of me, no fingers, no, no nothing, absolutely nothing inside of me. He increased my pay to three or four hundred dollars as long as he could touch me. Um, I still never, I, I swear I never touched him, the whole entire time I never ever touched him. Um, but he, he

DETECTIVE: //How many times would you say you went?

Hundreds. Hundreds, I was - he used to tell me I was his favorite. He bought me a car. He bought me

DETECTIVE: //This Jeep that you're driving?

No. I had a brand new Dodge Neon. I got plane, I got a plane ticket to New York, I got spending money whenever I wanted. Like, I was in there deep. I was - he asked my parents to emancipate me so I could live with him. Or he didn't ask my parents, he asked me to ask my parents, I'm sorry. He act - he actually wanted me to come live with him.

DETECTIVE: As like a girlfriend?

Sex slave, whatever you want to call it. Yeah. Um, but it escalated - he, he just increased my pay, as long as he could touch me. I wouldn't let him put anything inside of me. And then one day he just did, one day he just put his hand like his fingers. And um,

DETECTIVE: How long would you say, from the very first time you went,

Months. Honestly, I never kept track, like of, of what happened when. I just can tell you in which order things progressed.

Defense Transcript 07/26/17           11 October 11, 2005 PBPD
Page 74 of 111                     Public Records Request No.: 17-295
DOJ-OGR-00031484
